name: jQFader
tagline: A simple jQuery plugin to make fading out elements
body:
jQFader v1.0 ============ #### What you need jQuery library v1.4+ : http://jquery.com/ #### How to use it 
jQuery(".yourclass").jqfader();

.yourclass{ display:none; }
####Parameters
NameValueDefault
speednumber500
randomizefalse|truefalse
reversefalse|truefalse
animatenumber500
callbackfunctionvoid
You can find examples here : http://git.mgeoffray.fr/jQFader/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
